text: Lana du Pont (born July 6, 1939) is an American equestrian. She competed in two events at the 1964 Summer Olympics. She was the first woman to take part in three-day eventing at the Olympics. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:American female equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of the United States Category:Equestrians at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Philadelphia
title: Lana du Pont
